title: How to Make Tex Mex Beef and Potatoes

steps.headline: Brown and cook the meat in a large skillet.
steps.description: Add the peppers and onions in the skillet and cook thoroughly. Drain the oils and place back on the heat.

steps.headline: Add the water and taco mix into the skillet.
steps.description: Ensure the meat is well covered with the mix and add the cheese, potatoes, and corn. Combine everything together.

steps.headline: Transfer the mixture to a 13" x 9" baking dish.
Allow the mixture to bake for about 20 minutes.
steps.description: Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until it's heated through.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Brown and cook the meat in a large skillet. Add the peppers and onions in the skillet and cook thoroughly. Drain the oils and place back on the heat. Add the water and taco mix into the skillet. Ensure the meat is well covered with the mix and add the cheese, potatoes, and corn. Combine everything together. Transfer the mixture to a 13" x 9" baking dish. Cover the top with foil. Allow the mixture to bake for about 20 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until it's heated through. Serve immediately.
